text: [Music]
my name is Clara and I'm head of
technology and operations in our HP Bank
Singapore Irish B Bank is a full licence
bank with a network of seven branches in
Singapore for more than half a century
we have been serving our client helping
both individuals and corporates
in Singapore in building their business
opportunities as we deploy new
applications in the cloud and as we
migrate more workloads on the cloud our
engineers need the right knowledge and
skill set to build and run applications
on the cloud we need to retrain our
engineers do you need to know exactly
what to do and how to do it on AWS we
need to write the skills and and the
knowledge and certifications to do that
job we started with it sensual training
to bring everybody on the same level to
have a common understanding of cloud and
more importantly to have executive
alignment we use a combinations of
formal classroom training workshops
on-the-job training as well to better
understand our shared responsibilities
the best practices and how to scale
effectively and securely on the cloud we
use AWS training and certification as an
incentive in fact certification is
included as one of the key performance
indicator for each employee who is
involved in cloud initiative we identify
employees who are open to moving from
the old world to a new approach of doing
things and we invest in their training
investment in start training and
supporting them in certification is key
to retaining our talent pool to those
organisations who are planning to adopt
cloud I strongly recommend that you
start with a small core team work
closely with AWS to do a skills
assessment and identify courses for your
employees to attend for those who are
looking for a career opportunities in
the financial industries I strongly
recommend AWS training and certificate
it will allow you to have a good
understanding of AWS platform and its
services if you have not gone on AWS
training we would not have achieved what
we have achieved so far and we would not
have the strong confidence and trust in
what we do today
[Music]
